mapper.select: SELECT b.inqry_id, b.inqry_ref_id, b.inqry_group_ord, b.inqry_title, b.inqry_cntnt, b.inqry_pwd, b.inqry_regist_date, b.inqry_update_date, b.inqry_delete_yn, b.inqry_mber_id, a.rn FROM ( select rownum rn, inqry_id, inqry_ref_id, inqry_group_ord, inqry_title, inqry_cntnt, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_update_date, inqry_delete_yn, inqry_mber_id from (select tb_inqry.* from tb_inqry where inqry_group_ord = 0 order by inqry_id desc ) ) A INNER JOIN tb_inqry B on A.inqry_id = B.inqry_ref_id WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND a.inqry_delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY b.inqry_ref_id desc, b.inqry_group_ord

SELECT b.inqry_id, b.inqry_ref_id, b.inqry_group_ord, b.inqry_title, b.inqry_cntnt, b.inqry_pwd, b.inqry_regist_date, b.inqry_update_date, b.inqry_delete_yn, b.inqry_mber_id, a.rn FROM ( select rownum rn, inqry_id, inqry_ref_id, inqry_group_ord, inqry_title, inqry_cntnt, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_update_date, inqry_delete_yn, inqry_mber_id from (SELECT i.* FROM tb_inqry i JOIN tb_mber m ON i.inqry_mber_id = m.mber_id WHERE i.inqry_id IN ( SELECT inqry_ref_id FROM tb_inqry GROUP BY inqry_ref_id HAVING COUNT(*) < 2 ) ORDER BY inqry_id DESC ) ) A INNER JOIN tb_inqry B on A.inqry_id = B.inqry_ref_id WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND a.inqry_delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY b.inqry_ref_id desc, b.inqry_group_ord
SELECT inqry_id, inqry_ref_id, inqry_group_ord, inqry_title, inqry_cntnt, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_update_date, inqry_delete_yn, inqry_mber_id FROM tb_inqry WHERE inqry_id = #{inqryId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.* FROM tb_inqry i JOIN tb_mber m ON i.inqry_mber_id = m.mber_id WHERE i.inqry_id IN ( SELECT inqry_ref_id FROM tb_inqry GROUP BY inqry_ref_id HAVING COUNT(*) < 2 ) AND m.MBER_ROLE_CODE <> 'C0402' ORDER BY i.inqry_id DESC, i.inqry_regist_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_inqry (inqry_id, inqry_ref_id, inqry_group_ord, inqry_title, inqry_cntnt, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_update_date, inqry_delete_yn, inqry_mber_id) VALUES (inqry_seq.nextval, #{inqryRefId}, 1, #{inqryTitle}, #{inqryCntnt}, #{inqryPwd}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), null, 'N', #{inqryMberId})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ( select rownum rn, inqry_id, inqry_ref_id, inqry_group_ord, inqry_title, inqry_cntnt, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_update_date, inqry_delete_yn, inqry_mber_id from (SELECT i.* FROM tb_inqry i JOIN tb_mber m ON i.inqry_mber_id = m.mber_id WHERE i.inqry_id IN ( SELECT inqry_ref_id FROM tb_inqry GROUP BY inqry_ref_id HAVING COUNT(*) < 2 ) ORDER BY inqry_id DESC ) ) A INNER JOIN tb_inqry B on A.inqry_id = B.inqry_ref_id AND a.inqry_delete_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_inqry SET inqry_cntnt = #{inqryCntnt}, inqry_update_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') WHERE inqry_id = #{inqryId}
